title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Madden Stories with Sam Farmer, Cowboys Playoffs with Matt Mosley, Tom Curran on Mac's Struggles
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Madden Stories with Sam Farmer, Cowboys Playoffs with Matt Mosley, Tom Curran on Mac's Struggles
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, it's top takes of the week, including how one of John Madden's cornerstone beliefs would benefit today's coaches (3:00), and what Dak Prescott and Baker Mayfield have in common, and their biggest difference (8:00). Then, L.A. Times NFL Writer Sam Farmer shares some of his favorite personal interactions with Madden (18:00). NBC Sports Boston’s Patriots insider Tom Curran reacts to Mac Jones's struggles in a loss to the Bills, and how much longer Belichick will coach (28:00). Cowboys writer Matt Mosley examines what looked different about Dak against Washington, and how Dallas stacks up against the Packers in a potential playoff matchup (34:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his week 17 Browns/Steelers, and Cardinals/Cowboys picks are "sharp" or "square" (44:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
